mapper.select: SELECT C.ID , C.NAME , A.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME FROM COURSE C LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ID = C.ADMIN_ID
SELECT C.ID , C.NAME , A.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME FROM COURSE C LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ID = C.ADMIN_ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}

SELECT C.ID AS COURSE_ID , C.NAME AS COURSE_NAME , S.ID , S.NAME , S.BUILDING , S.FLOOR , S.ROOM_NO , I.ID AS INSTRUCTOR_ID , I.NAME AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME , A.ID AS ADMIN_ID , A.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME FROM COURSE C LEFT OUTER JOIN SUBJECT S ON C.ID = S.COURSE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ID = C.ADMIN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN INSTRUCTOR I ON I.ID = S.INSTRUCTOR_ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}

SELECT A.ID , C.ID AS COURSE_ID , C.NAME AS COURSE_NAME , M.ID AS MEMBER_ID , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME FROM ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN COURSE C ON C.ID = A.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.ID = A.MEMBER_ID WHERE C.ID = #{id}
